section.section: The State Higher Education Labor Relations Board and the State Labor Relations Board jointly shall appoint an Executive Director of the boards.

The Executive Director:
is responsible to and serves at the pleasure of the boards; and
is entitled to the salary provided in the State budget.

text.section:
The Executive Director shall perform the duties that the boards assign, including:
operating the office of the boards; and
keeping the official records of the boards.
The Executive Director may hire any staff necessary to carry out the provisions of this subtitle.

section.section: With approval of the boards, the Executive Director may employ professional consultants.
Each professional consultant serves at the pleasure of the Executive Director.
